data: As the protagonist of An Apple A Day, you play the role of a doctor who must dodge apples (the very thing that's supposed to keep you away) while collecting life-saving medicine, proving that sometimes even the best intentions can lead to some seriously challenging situations!

Taco Run is a fun and challenging platformer where players navigate an abandoned nuclear waste warehouse, avoid spicy hot sauce hazards, and collect various food items to create the ultimate taco masterpiece.
Cloud Dragon is an intense single room boss fight game in the style of Megaman, where players must battle a powerful dragon with lightning fast reflexes and strategic weapon choices.

Hola 1 es un juego de disparos en primera persona donde los jugadores 
asumen el papel del Jefe Maestro, un supersoldado, que lucha contra una 
alianza alien√≠gena llamada el Covenant para salvar a la humanidad y al 
universo.
The Dungeon of Rooms is a thrilling roguelike dungeon crawler where players must navigate through a labyrinth of challenging rooms, defeat a variety of enemies, and collect powerful loot to survive.
